DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy PDL 1064-nm Nd : YAG laser treatment facial redness .
DOC.brief_title: Pulsed Dye Laser ( PDL ) vs. Microsecond 1064-nm Nd : YAG Laser Treatment Diffuse Facial Redness
DOC.criteria: Healthy patient 1855 year age erythematotelangiectatic rosacea ( verified PI ) . Subjects willing provide inform consent participation study . Pregnant lactate individual Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent . Subjects know history photosensitive condition ( e.g . Systemic lupus , polymorphous light eruption ) Subjects facial telangiectasia diameter great 2 mm . Subject significant ( determined PI ) acute inflammatory papule , pustule , vesicle involve central face .
